âœ¨ It is now possible thanks to SmartInvite extension.

Thanks to our extension for Google Chrome, directly from your CRM, you will be able to:
ğŸ‘‰ Check in real time if your customer is registered into your Ambassador Program ;

In order to work, the following information need to be gathered inside your customer's CRM card/table:

- Last name
- Email address (required for registering the customer into your program)
- Phone number (required for sending the survey and/or invitation via SMS)
